text: The following lists events that have happened in 1828 in the Sublime State of Persia. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Fat′h-Ali Shah Qajar ==Events== * Russo- Persian War (1826–28) finished. * February 10 – Treaty of Turkmenchay was signed between Persia and Russia. ==References== Persia Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1820s in Iran Persia
title: 1828 in Iran
